songs.title: Cool for the Summer (Plastic Plates Remix)
songs.album: Cool for the Summer: The Remixes
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh

[Verse 1]
Tell me what you want
What you like
It's okay
I'm a little curious too
Tell me if it's wrong, if it's right
I don't care
I can keep a secret, can you?

[Pre-Chorus]
Got my mind on your body and your body on my mind
Got a taste for the cherry, I just need to take a bite
Don't tell your mother
Kiss one another
Die for each other
We're cool for the summer

[Break]
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh

[Verse 2]
Tell me if I won
If I did, what's my prize?
I just wanna play with you too
Even if they judge, fuck it, I'll do the time
I just wanna have some fun with you

[Pre-Chorus]
Got my mind on your body and your body on my mind
Got a taste for the cherry, I just need to take a bite
Don't tell your mother
Kiss one another
Die for each other
We're cool for the summer

[Break]
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
We're cool for the summer
We're cool for the summer

[Breakdown]
Got my mind on your body and your body on my mind
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Got a taste for the cherry, I just need to take a bite
Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh
Tale me down
'Cause I'm your body type

[Chorus]
We're cool for the summer
'Cause I'm your body type
You and I
We're cool for the summer
We're cool for the summer
